headline: The Resonance Beta Is OUT
caption: April 26, 2018
paragraph: The wait is over. Sign up for the beta now, and you'll receive a special invitation in your inbox and email instructions on how we want you to start experiencing Resonance. Enjoy resonating.

headline: The Resonance Beta Release
caption: April 21, 2018
paragraph: The Resonance Team will be releasing the beta version of their app on Testflight for beta users. Their ambition is to introduce a new platform for sharing, curating, and cultivating quality music.

headline: The Resonance Beta Is Coming
caption: March 21, 2018
paragraph: What we have in store for you is more than a mere assembly of tastemakers, original artists, playlist overseers, more than a mob of collaborators, creators and promoters, more than a community... A COLLABORATIVELY CROWDSOURCED collective will be coming out soon for our beta testers. You will be fostering our ecosystem, accelerating our user feedback, and spurring the hype for resonators everywhere. We ask that all music lovers create an account, sign up for our email list on the homepage, and sign up for beta testing on our site. There's limited space, so sign up fast!

headline: The Resonance Team Has Something in Store For You
caption: February 21, 2018
paragraph: Resonance is redefining music discovery with an app that will promote curators, tastemakers, and artists to share quality music. We will be having curated music collections, collaborative playlists, and other features that make the music about the ones who share it.
